name: Tsubaki
text: Hahー!!
*CLANK!!!*
Faced with Tsubaki's skillful swordsmanship, I couldn't even counterattack.

name: Me
text: Gggggghh!?

name: Tsubaki
text: Hyaah!!
*CLANG!!*

name: Tsubaki
text: Come on, you can't win with defense only!!

name: Me
text: Even if you say that...
If it weren't for my observant eye and my ability to run away, I would have long ago at least had one of my arms cut off, if not been killed.

name: Sakura
text: Fuma-kun, hang in there~♪ You can't win by just running around and trying to escape.

name: Me
text: Sh-Shut up!! Don't be unreasonable!!
When I looked over, Sakura, who had quickly passed her test of skill, was happily spectating.

name: Tsubaki
text: Hehe, you still have more in the tank. To think that you have time to be looking around...
*CLASH!!*

name: Me
text: Uugh!?
She had aimed right for my shoulder, but I somehow managed to ward it off by a hair's breadth.

name: Me
text: (They're right, it'll only get worse if I continue like this. I have no chance of winning with only defense, just like Tsubaki said.)
If I didn't find an opening to counterattack soonー

name: Tsubaki
text: I'm not into pointlessly toying with people. Let's get this over with.
Tsubaki took a big step forward and raised her sword.

name: Me
text: (!! Nowー)
I evaded her powerful slash at the last possible moment and lunged at her.

name: Tsubaki
text: What the...

name: Me
text: (I've been observing while evading her attacks. After Tsubaki swings from her right, there's a tiny opening on her side!)

name: Me
text: (If I can take advantage of that... or...!)

name: Me
text: This is it!!
*CLAAAANNGG!!*

name: Tsubaki
text: ーーーーHngh!?

name: Sakura
text: Oohh!? Fuma-kun, you were able to get a counter in!!

name: Me
text: Phew... I wasn't just evading... take this!
I put all my weight into the attack and drove my ninjato into Tsubaki's side.

name: Me
text: (It'll end up being a deep wound, but she's not an opponent I can beat while going easy on her... No hard feelings, please.)
As I had these thoughts, the sensation of cutting through her blood vessels wasー

name: Tsubaki
text: Ugh...

name: Me
text: (Wait, something's not right!!)
*SWOOSH!! BSSHHH!!!*
I withdrew my ninjato before I could think about it, contorted my body, and put some distance between me and Tsubaki.

name: Sakura
text: Ehh!? Fuma-kun!?

name: Tsubaki
text: What's the matter? You come that far and get scared to see a little blood?

name: Me
text: That's not it... it's just, in the spur of the moment I thought that I'd lose if I committed to that attack right now.
I had let my once-in-a-lifetime chance slip away, but I was sure of my instinct.

name: Me
text: (Come to think of it... it's weird for someone as skilled as Tsubaki to leave an opening that obvious.)
So basically, there was some kind of trap, and she herself was luring me into itー

name: Tsubaki
text: Hehe, I see... So you sensed my Ninja Art? Your combat skills are below average, but you're a quick thinker.

name: Me
text: Your Ninja Art...? Are you a Taimanin?

name: Tsubaki
text: Hehe... hehehe.
Without answering my question, Tsubaki briskly sheathed her sword while laughing.

name: Tsubaki
text: Let's just say... you passed.

name: Tsubaki
text: The mission is in two days. Do your very best and earn your pay.
Tsubaki said and departed into the darkness.

name: Me
text: Who the hell... is that woman...?

name: Sakura
text: Yay~ Fuma-kun!! I don't know what's going on, but congratulations on passing!

name: Me
text: Uh, yeah... But that just now...
She had said that it was a serious fight, but it still didn't feel like she had fought at full strength.
If she had genuinely come to win, I might've been beaten in an instant.

name: Me
text: (Even people with her skill signed up for this job... My interest is getting more and more piqued. I guess I'll do a bit of research until the day of the job.)

name: Sakura
text: Anyways, now we have a juicy job!

name: Sakura
text: Let's do our best and aim for that fancy dinner, Fuma-kun♪

name: Me
text: Sakura... You sure are carefree as can be...
Sheesh. I shrugged at Sakura, who was giggling with dollar signs in her eyes.
